scripts.dev-windows: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js" "cd python && venv\Scripts\activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.dev-linux: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js" "cd python && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.start: concurrently "server.js" "cd python && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000"
